authority.preview_text: It's not what you think (and it's fixable)
authority.body:
Hi [FIRST_NAME],

It's not that you're bad at bookkeeping.

It's that they can't do their job when your books are incomplete.

You send them a folder of receipts and bank statements.

They have to:
‚Üí Guess which expenses are business vs. personal
‚Üí Categorize everything (are you sure that's "office supplies"?)
‚Üí Reconcile accounts with missing transactions
‚Üí Ask you questions you can't answer ("What was this $[AMOUNT] charge?")
‚Üí Make assumptions that might not be in your best interest

So they either:
a) Spend hours doing bookkeeping (and charge you $[AMOUNT]/hour for it)
b) Make conservative assumptions (you miss deductions)

‚úì Clear business/personal separation

‚Üí Actually being your trusted advisor

And you get better service for less money.
